body_html:
Thanks for your info.

1, I can see at lease 4 code files have TF_CUDNN_WORKSPACE_LIMIT_IN_MB
where can i change this value? Is there any config file, which i can set it once only?

2, For your solution about resume training after crash. So far i do not know which command line can do this. Other popular DL framework, such as caffe support this directly.

body:
Thanks for your info.

1, I can see at lease 4 code files have TF_CUDNN_WORKSPACE_LIMIT_IN_MB
where can i change this value? Is there any config file, which i can set it once only?

2, For your solution about resume training after crash. So far i do not know which command line can do this. Other popular DL framework, such as caffe support this directly.
